message_1: In a basketball tournament, there are 8 teams competing. If each team plays against each other exactly once, how many matches will be played in total? (Hint: use the Catalan number formula)
message_2:
The hint to use the Catalan number formula is incorrect for this problem. Instead, we will use the combination formula to solve this problem.

In a basketball tournament with 8 teams, each team plays against each other exactly once. To find the total number of matches, we can use the combination formula:

C(n, k) = n! / (k!(n-k)!)

where n is the total number of teams (8 in this case) and k is the number of teams in each match (2 in this case).

C(8, 2) = 8! / (2!(8-2)!)
= 8! / (2!6!)
= (8 × 7 × 6 × 5 × 4 × 3 × 2 × 1) / ((2 × 1)(6 × 5 × 4 × 3 × 2 × 1))
= (8 × 7) / (2 × 1)
= 56 / 2
= 28

So, there will be 28 matches played in total.
